column3: I closed #9566 because I thought it was getting out of hand, but since we're going that way anyway, here's how my attempt at it looked back then:\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9566/files#diff-8e9b29a6133dd7bf43643c37c5c4689aR27
utACK abd58a2fcae767e9074c49b64e9c89e5168d7005\nI'm just going to merge this, if it fixes the build it shouldn't be open for weeks, can be improved later if necessary.
Please factor this out to a function to prevent repetition.
